item.title: Bio Filter Design & Fabrication Apprenticeship
item.dc:creator: rss
item.description:
I began construction on more ponds on the porch which feed into the central biofilter. They will mostly be for plants, as they will be a welcome addition to the cycle, taking up the free nitrogen and giving us freeway adjacent dwellers some much needed extra oxygen. Also spent a few hours at the local… Continue reading Bio Filter Design & Fabrication Apprenticeship

The post Bio Filter Design & Fabrication Apprenticeship appeared first on 2 or 3 things I Know About Her.
item.content:encoded:
I began construction on more ponds on the porch which feed into the central biofilter. They will mostly be for plants, as they will be a welcome addition to the cycle, taking up the free nitrogen and giving us freeway adjacent dwellers some much needed extra oxygen.

Also spent a few hours at the local Koi Nursery fabricating biofilters as part of my apprenticeship there. Can’t wait to go back next weekend.

The post Bio Filter Design & Fabrication Apprenticeship appeared first on 2 or 3 things I Know About Her.

item.title: building bridges at barcamp
item.dc:creator: rss
item.description:
Attended barcampla sunday. Chris Messina of flock fame gave a nice talk about the WWW as an event stream, social space, and datastore.
